module.title: dì-
module.p: dì- is a negative compounding prefix.

ul.li: arm [noun] weapon ⇒ armaich [verb] arm ⇒ dì-armaich disarm
bun [noun] base ⇒ bunaich [verb] establish ⇒ dì-bhunaich disestablish
coille [noun] forest ⇒ coilltich [verb] afforest ⇒ dì-choilltich deforest
luchd [noun] cargo, freight ⇒ luchdaich [verb] load ⇒ dì-luchdaich unload
mol [verb] praise ⇒ dì-mol verbally abuse, disparage, dispraise (also diomol)
salann [noun] salt ⇒ salainnich [verb] salinate ⇒ dì-shalainnich desalinate
ceann [noun] head ⇒ dì-cheann behead, decapitate (also dì-cheannaich)
cnàmh [verb] digest ⇒ cnàmhadh [noun] digestion ⇒ dì-chnàmhadh indigestion
leum [verb] leum ⇒ leum [noun] jumping ⇒ dì-leum [masculine noun] fetter, hobble
